title: Usain Bolt
subtitle:
One ennemy incoming on our radars. Commander, prepare yourself.
Time flies, you need to react quicky. We ensured you have enough resources to fight.
description:
According to our informers, fortunately the enemy is not so dangerous.
Their radar is not so evolved, so our ships should not have so much endangered.
If the enemy still behaves like he did before, its behavior is rather simple: he flies straightforward, and shoots everything on its path when it enters its radar.

Take your time, prepare, give your orders. Your men obey blindly. Try to spare human lives.
